channel.title: Help please been at this for few days
channel.description:
ok i was getting the unsupported major or minor error 51.0 i got rid of it but now i get this.
[code]load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class[/code]

item.title: Help please been at this for few days
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

202685:

ok ill explain this. your tryin to load main class Client. it needs to be client. “c” has to be lowercase or it wont work

No.

To OP: Are the run file and Java classes on the same directory?

Read full topic
item.source: Help please been at this for few days
